p: The most characteristic association of species among the floral ingredients and that occur in the different styles analyzed, especially in the “ zhourat” is that of the Damascus rose ( Rosa × damascena) with chamomile ( Chamomilla matricaria) ( Table 4). Aloysia citrodora Palau [ = A. triphylla [L’Her.] Britton] leaves often appear together with the above ( Figure 5).
